bill.title: An act relating to workforce development
bill.description: An act relating to workforce development

referrals.name: Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs

history.action: Committee Bill read first time
Referred to Committee on Appropriations per Rule 35(a)
Read Second Time
Rep. Marcotte of Coventry spoke for the committee on Commerce and Economic Development
Rep. Myers of Essex recommended for the committee on Appropriations
Rep. Marcotte of Coventry moved to amend the bill
Which was agreed to
Third Reading Ordered
Rep. Shaw of Pittsford moved to amend the bill
Which was agreed to
Read Third time
Roll Call Results Passed -- Needed 63 of 124 to Pass -- Yeas = 124, Nays = 0
Passed
Read 1st time & referred to Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs
Rules suspended & taken up for immediate consideration, on motion of Senator Sirotkin
Rules suspended & bill committed to Committee on Appropriations with the report of Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs   intact
Entered on Notice Calendar
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Appropriations
New Business/Second Reading
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Appropriations
Read 2nd time, reported favorably with proposal of amendment by Senator Clarkson for Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs
Reported favorably by Senator Starr for Committee on Appropriations with proposal of amendment
Proposal of amendment by Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs amended as recommended by Committee on Appropriations
Senator Pollina moved to strike out Sec 11 of the proposal of amendment of Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs
Motion disagreed to
Proposal of amendment  by Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs, as amended, agreed to
3rd reading ordered
New Business/Third Reading
Pending third reading, Senator(s) Rodgers motion to amend proposal of amendment; text
Proposal of amendment not agreed to
Pending third reading, Senator(s) Sirotkin motion to amend proposal of amendment; text
Proposal of amendment agreed to
Read 3rd time & passed in concurrence with proposal of amendment
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Senate Message, passed in Concurrence with proposal of amendment
Rules Suspended and Taken up for Immediate Consideration as moved by Rep. McCoy of Poultney
Senate Proposal of Amendment not concurred in and Committee of Conference requested upon motion of Rep. O'Sullivan of Burlington
Speaker appointed Marcotte of Coventry, Kimbell of Woodstock and O'Sullivan of Burlington as members of the Committee of Conference on the part of the House
Rules suspended and bill messaged forthwith to the Senate as moved by Rep. McCoy of Poultney
House message House refused to concur in Senate proposal of amendment & requested Conference Committee; House Conference Committee members appointed
Committee of Conference appointed: Senators Sirotkin, Clarkson, and Brock
Rules suspended & action messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Rules suspended & taken up for immediate consideration, on motion of Senator Ashe
Committee of Conference report submitted by Senator Sirotkin for Committee, text
Committee of Conference report adopted on roll call, requested by Senator Ashe, Passed -- Needed 14 of 27 to Pass -- Yeas = 24, Nays = 3
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Senate message, report of committee of conference adopted
Rules Suspended and Taken up for Immediate Consideration as moved by Rep. McCoy of Poultney
Committee of Conference report adopted (House bill)
Rules Suspended and Action on the bill messaged to the Senate forthwith and the bill delivered to the Governor forthwith as moved by Rep. McCoy of Poultney.
House message House adopted Conference Committee report
Senate message, report of committee of conference adopted
Delivered to the Governor on June 19, 2019
Signed by Governor on June 20, 2019
House message: Governor approved bill on June 20, 2019

votes.desc: Roll Call Results Passed -- Needed 63 of 124 to Pass -- Yeas = 124, Nays = 0
Committee of Conference report adopted on roll call, requested by Senator Ashe, Passed -- Needed 14 of 27 to Pass -- Yeas = 24, Nays = 3
